overview: Alice strips naked on a sleazy stage before an all-male audience. Daisy lives in a glittering mansion. Both these women are in love with the same man - Jamie Fell. The night Jamie comes out of prison, Alice, who has lived on steamy memories for five years, visits Murphy, a crooked detective who helped the Holt family frame Jamie in a $6 million robbery. Murphy tells all there is to tell about the outrageous comings and goings of the richest and most ruthlessly passionate family in recent history. When Murphy has finished his incredible tale of deceit and sexual indulgence, Alice is left to face one question: Should she leave Jamie to Daisy, the woman responsible for his disastrous past - the only woman he loves?
tagline: The Outrageous Conclusion To The Award-Winning Series Climaxes! A Dynasty Explodes With Lies And Lust!
title: Sinners 3
